QuestData.Title: Truce?
QuestData.Description: Watch yerself, mon.$b$bDrakuru shrunk more $r heads than I can remember - and even if I could remember, I couldn't count that high. Lucky for you I be stuck in dis cage or I'd be addin' one more to da list.$b$bBut things bein' what they are, mebbe we be puttin' our differences aside fer a time, eh?$b$bDrakuru know things, mon. Things that will aid you in your struggle here.$b$b<Drakuru cuts the palm of his hand on one of his tusks and extends it through the cage.>$b$bSo, what you say, mon... truce?
QuestData.LogDescription: Drakuru at Granite Springs wants you to use the Dull Carving Knife near his cage and then speak to him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Good choice, mon. You won't be livin' to regret it....
QuestData.RewardText: There!$b$bNow we be connected by blood, mon. A true bond we be havin'.$b$bYou lissen carefully to Drakuru, $r. There be much to do.
